name: Lights Ouuuuut Clone
description:
Little yellow.. different..

actually no, it's none of those things. It's your basic run of the mill Lights Out clone, done as a flash educational thing 4-5 years ago. 

The game is simple, click the blocks to turn out the lights. turn em all off you win!

What do you win?  the silent embrace of darkness.

whoa that took a dark turn.
